title: For first time PTV to broadcast live  Friday Sermon  from President House: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 01 (APP): Federal Minister of Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain said on Friday that for the first time in the history of Pakistan, the “Friday Sermon” was being broadcast live from the Jamia Masjid of the President House.
In a statement, he said broadcast of the Friday sermon live was an important step towards the model of the state of Madina.
Fawad said that the PTV will broadcast the sermon live every Friday at 1:00 pm.
